CHAT.comment: JO ANNE B. BARNHART, COMMISSIONER OF SOCIAL SECURITY, Petitioner v. PEABODY COAL COMPANY, ET AL.; and MICHAEL H. HOLLAND, ET AL., Petitioners v. BELLAIRE CORPORATION, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:06 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA B. McDOWELL ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER BARNHART
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PETER BUSCEMI ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS HOLLAND, ET AL.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN G. ROBERTS, JR. ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS PEABODY COAL COMPANY, ET AL.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY S. SUTTON ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS BELLAIRE CORPORATION, ET AL.
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA B. McDOWELL ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER BARNHART
(Whereupon, at 12:06 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
